subject: RE: Update on the US site

full_threads.body: @heath jsut gonna close this one.
@joel can you please run through these for me? She is referring to the US version of the site of course.

Hi Heath,

Sorry a few extra things:

Home page – video button looks odd so can you please remove it
Our work – the case studies are not appearing there…, when you get them back is it possible to remove the industry filters? As we won’t have enough to show on the US site
Our videos – there is nothing showing on this page – can you please include from the Australian site – two cities integrated, bravura, 1-stop, hipages, elmo, kerwin rae
Footer – after quality policy can you add Environmental Policy and link to that page? I didn’t realise the Quality & Environment accreditations were global so Alister wants to keep them
Finally forms, there are multiple forms and I don’t know if they are housed in wordpress or hubspot. If hubspot I will need to clone these and provide you the link to include on the website:
Home page – learn from the experts, ready to reimagine your workspace, and subscribe in the footer
Our story – join our team form
Our work – get in touch form
Why Axiom? – get in touch form
Contact – talk to us form
Also, all the pop ups would surely be hubspot, I just need confirmation from you what do you need from me to update all forms above?
Also, I will still be working into the night but is it possible that we go live in the morning? I don’t mind if not everything is done.

Kindest Regards,

Sarah-Jane Lamont
Client Relations Executive Assistant

T 1300 11 22 32
M 0421 478 501
E sarah-jane.lamont@axiomworkplaces.com.au <mailto:sarah-jane.lamont@axiomworkplaces.com.au>
LI linkedin.com/in/sarah-jane-lamont-93542627/ <https://www.linkedin.com/in/sarah-jane-lamont-93542627/>

<https://axiomworkplaces.com.au/our-insight/what-does-the-future-of-work-look-like-for-employees-employers-and-workplaces/>

Subject: Re: Update on the US site

Hi Sarah-Jane,

You can change this to whatever you like, see attached screen shot. We haven’t updated any of these FYI. It’s a direct copy of the live site.

Keep in mind that the keyword you enter there is not necessarily what you will rank (or should be ranking for). It’s only indicative to provide some suggestions.

I hope that helps?

Thanks,
Heath Maguire
DIRECTOR

Regarding the Hubspot linking… I’m not 100%, but assumably you would need to register that domain name within your HubSpot account. Brand Chemistry are the HubSpot pro’s… Can they help you with that one?

Regarding the case studies, you are all set: https://axiomus.wpperk.cloud/our-work/ <https://axiomus.wpperk.cloud/our-work/>

The Blogs have me baffled, but we will get to the bottom of it and I’ll have an update over to you with they are ready to review.

Thanks and speak soon,
Heath Maguire

Hi Heath,

Footer:

Would be able to amend the footer of the U.S. to the following:

Remove WHS, quality and environment policy
Remove the global mark icons
Where it lists the Australian capital cities, could that text be replaced with About | Projects | News | Contact (and About to Our story; Projects will link to Our work; News will link to Our Insights)
Similar to the Unispace example further below, we need to have “2020 Axiom Workplaces All rights Reserved. Privacy Policy” – I need to find out whether it’s a requirement in the U.S. to also have a Cookie Policy and Modern Slavery Statement.

From: Heath Maguire <heath@wpperk.com <mailto:heath@wpperk.com>>
Sent: Wednesday, 11 November 2020 1:41 PM
To: Sarah-Jane Lamont <Sarah-Jane.Lamont@axiomworkplaces.com.au <mailto:Sarah-Jane.Lamont@axiomworkplaces.com.au>>
Subject: Update on the US site

Hi Sarah-Jane,

We have been working on the US site and the clone is ready for you to access.

To view the front end head to:
https://axiomus.wpperk.cloud/ <https://axiomus.wpperk.cloud/>

And enter:
Username: axiomusa
Password: axiomusa

To access the backend head to:
https://axiomus.wpperk.cloud/wp-admin/ <https://axiomus.wpperk.cloud/wp-admin/>

If you can see the normal wordpress login screen, then login with your normal details (or reset your password). If you can’t see the normal wordpress login, then please complete the above steps.

We will have the country switcher ready by tomorrow and I’ll update you once it’s there for you to check.

Thanks and speak soon,
Heath Maguire
DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134 <tel:1300%20072%20134>
Mobile: 0415 162 271 <tel:0415%20162%20271>
Email: heath@wpperk.com <mailto:heath@wpperk.com>
